DESCRIPTION: When played, remains in hand and #yUpgrades. NL Can be #yupgraded any number of times. NL Reset #yupgrades at the end of your turn. NL Cannot be #yupgraded outside of combat.
A debuff that deals damage at the end of creature's turn. If the enemy is #yconstricted, it will do its move first and then take damage from #yconstriction.

Instead of obtaining this card, increase the value of a card in your deck with the same name by its #yCollective value if you already have one. You are more likely to find this card in future card rewards the higher the value is.
